tool.name: Eml validate:
tool.description: check if your EML file is valid

param.name: inputmetadatafile
param.label: EML metadata file
param.help: Insert only metadata using EML standard.

tool.help:
**What it does?** --------------------
Eml_validate processes an EML document using the XSD schema for the appropriate version of EML and determines if the document is schema-valid as defined by the XSD specification.
**How to use it?** --------------------
You need to input an EML file in xml format. And the tool will produce a text file with the information you need. There are two different cases: 1) Your EML file is valid. 2) Your EML file is not valid, and a list of errors is displayed for you to improve your EML file.
